attributes.action: Close the borders to non residents - until a vaccine is available for covid 19
attributes.additional_details:
We can't run or hide from this virus - we need strong controls and leadership. A consistent message and plan put in place that has a long term effect.

Closing the borders may mean staycations become the norm for the next few years, but that's better than stay at home.

Follow successful countries - New Zealand and Taiwan have both had success from this approach. Why wouldn't we learn from them?

We can't keep destroying our economy and toying with people's wellbeing - with years of lockdowns.
attributes.background: Strictly enforce this lockdown, which you have already committed us to. Set up a robust track and trace programme, rollout mass testing and close the borders to non UK residents until a vaccine is available and/or cases drop around the world. Allowing us to stop doing these life destroying lockdowns

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for borders to be closed: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564165

Since you started your petition the Government has announced a new national lockdown. You can read the Prime Minister's announcement of new Covid-19 restrictions here: https://www.gov.uk/government/speeches/prime-ministers-address-to-the-nation-4-january-2021
